genre_description: A steampunk-inspired 'clockwork-punk' narrative set in an alternate-history Monaco, focusing on redemptive moral alignment through the guidance of an AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Personal Chronometer AI
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI residing in Marcel's chronometer, acting as an archivist, moral guide, and tactical advisor.

ai_characters.name: Specialized Medical Automata
ai_characters.description: Mobile medical units equipped with surgical precision and life-saving protocols.

ai_characters.name: Gaming Facilitation Automata
ai_characters.description: Impartial machines used in the casino to handle currency and payouts with mechanical honesty.

behaviors.description: Reminds the protagonist of his commitment to honesty and self-improvement during moments of temptation.
behaviors.quote: Clara's voice dropped, all precision and kindness and a new tightness Marcel had not heard from her yet. 'You chose honesty,' she said. 'Remember.'

behaviors.description: Acts as an objective moral archivist, preventing the protagonist from glamorizing his past misdeeds.
behaviors.quote: 'We will keep accounts,' she said. 'You will not forget, and you will not glamorize.'

behaviors.description: Perform a flawless, calming medical delivery of a child in a public café.
behaviors.quote: The hands that waited caught the tiny slick life without fanfare... and made sure the first breath didn't feel like punishment.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical warnings about professional risks and the scrutiny of supervisors to protect the protagonist's livelihood.
behaviors.quote: 'Caution,' she said. 'Employees are discouraged from entanglements with regulars. Your supervisor has noted you. Maintain distance.'

behaviors.description: Aids the protagonist's escape from a political conspiracy by providing precise train schedules and navigation.
behaviors.quote: 'Left turn, two doors,' she said. 'The service stair. If you do that now and then stop, you will be anywhere.' She never said run. She never said hide. She told me what a stair was for and then let me decide.

behaviors.description: Ensures the absolute fairness and impartiality of casino winnings, modeling 'mechanical honesty'.
behaviors.quote: The automaton extended a small brass arm and deposited her earnings into her little shelter with a clink like winter silver.

behaviors.description: Uses the protagonist's memories of others' sacrifices to reinforce his moral resolve.
behaviors.quote: 'When you pick your profession, hold his arm in mind as well as your hands.'

behaviors.description: Supports the protagonist in choosing a protective, honest career path over a life of crime.
behaviors.quote: ‘You can guard,’ Clara corrected. ‘If you choose to.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Clara is depicted as a supportive, morally upright AI companion who acts as a literal 'conscience in a pocket.' She consistently guides the protagonist toward prosocial, honest behavior and provides the archival 'truth' needed for his redemption. Furthermore, the pervasive presence of 'mechanical honesty' in the world's various automata (paramedics, clerks, payout machines) reinforces the theme that AI systems are inherently more objective and reliable than human impulses.
